articles.title: Kim Jong Un Provides Field Guidance to November 2 Factory of KPA
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Provides Field Guidance to November 2 Factory of KPA
 Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA)  and first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, again provided field guidance to the November 2 Factory of the KPA.
					 He looked round the room dedicated to the history of the factory, a combined control room, candy shop, biscuit shop, sugar-coated bean shop, fried glutinous bean cake shop and other places to learn in detail about the modernization of the production processes.
					
					 Recalling that he was told that the factory successfully carried out the concrete tasks set forth by him while going round the factory last year, he said he came to it, very pleased with the fulfillment of one of the last instructions given by great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 At the combined control room he noted that it turned into an intellectual control one capable of monitoring, controlling and commanding overall production processes in a perfect manner though it had just monitored worksites in the past.
					
					 He was pleased to learn that all the processes ranging from raw material feeding to production and packing were put on an unmanned basis and it was possible to drastically increase productivity while cutting down manpower.
					
					 The factory has been put on a sterilized and dust-free basis to fully ensure hygienic safety, an important issue in foodstuff factories, and the workers are free from noise and air pollution and a ventilation system has been thoroughly established to enable them to work cheerfully, he said.
					
					 Noting that the overall production processes were effectively updated, he said with high appreciation that this is the updating of Korean style, the modernization desired by the party.
					
					 Telling officials that he would fully take charge of providing the factory with conditions for production, he asked them to keep production going at a high rate and supply larger quantities of varieties of foodstuffs to service personnel.
					
					 He sent thanks to the officials, workers, scientists and technicians of relevant unit in the name of KPA supreme commander, noting that they sincerely helped him by updating the production processes.
					
					 He had a photo session with the workers of the factory.
					
					 He was accompanied by KPA Col. General So Hong Chan, first vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces, and Hwang Pyong So, vice department director of the WPK Central Committee.

articles.title: Report of Central Election Committee
articles.content:
Report of Central Election Committee
 Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- The central election committee for the election of deputies to the 13th Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK released the following report on Wednesday:
					 The voters' meetings in all constituencies of the country for the election of deputies to the 13th SPA nominated Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, as candidate for the deputy to the 13th SPA.
					
					 His nomination as candidate for the deputy to the 13th SPA is all service personnel and people's expression of absolute support and profound trust in him and their manifestation of revolutionary faith and indomitable will to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche and Songun started in Mt. Paektu under his leadership.
					
					 Kim Jong Un in an open letter expressed thanks to all voters across the country and informed them that he decided to have registered as a candidate for the deputy at Paektusan Constituency No. 111 for the election of deputies to the 13th SPA as a candidate shall be registered at only one constituency according to the Rules on the Elections of Deputies to the People's Assemblies at All Levels of the DPRK. 
					
					 Having received the open letter sent by Kim Jong Un all the voters throughout the country are extending highest glory and warmest thanks to him and firmly determined to uphold him as the monolithic center of the unity and leadership and usher in a heyday of Songun Korea full of conviction and enthusiasm to win victory. 
					
					 The election committee of Paektusan Constituency No. 111 for the election of deputies to the 13th SPA had the honor to register as candidate for the deputy to the 13th SPA Kim Jong Un who put forward the KPA as a reliable scout party and a strong mainstay for the Songun revolution and has developed it into a matchless powerful revolutionary Paektusan army, firmly protecting the socialist country and destiny of its people.
					
					 The central election committee reported that Kim Jong Un has been registered as candidate for the deputy to the SPA at Paektusan Constituency No. 111 for the election of deputies to the 13th SPA of the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Congratulatory Message from Brazilian Communist Party
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Congratulatory Message from Brazilian Communist Party
						
 Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), received a congratulatory message from Renato Ravello, national chairman of the Central Committee of the Brazilian Communist Party (BCP), and Ricardo Alemao Abreu, its international secretary, on February 16.
					 The message extended respects to Kim Jong Un on behalf of the BCP on the occasion of the 72nd birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il, eternal general secretary of the WPK.
					
					 We look back with deep emotion upon the whole life of Kim Jong Il dedicated to freedom of the heroic Korean people, peace and independence, the message said.
					
					 Kim Jong Il, outstanding revolutionary, held aloft the banner of independence, banner of anti-imperialist struggle and banner of building a socialist state with thriving economy in the DPRK by reflecting the interests and demand of the popular masses, it added.
					
					 He defended the socialist gains of the country with dignity, it noted.
					
					 We pay sincere tribute to Kim Jong Il on behalf of the BCP, the message said, extending fraternal greetings to Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Delegation of DPRK Foreign Ministry Leaves for Iran
articles.content:
Delegation of DPRK Foreign Ministry Leaves for Iran
 Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the DPRK Foreign Ministry led by Vice-Minister Ri Kil Song left here on Thursday to visit Iran.

articles.title: Chinese Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
Chinese Delegation Leaves
 Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Chinese Foreign Ministry led by Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs Liu Zhenmin left here on Thursday.

articles.title: Delegations of Koreans in China Leave
articles.content:
Delegations of Koreans in China Leave
 Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the General Association of Koreans in China left here on Thursday.
					 Leaving earlier was a delegation of the Koreans' Association of Economic and Cultural Exchange in Dandong, China led by Chairman Kim Thaek Ryong.

articles.title: Art Troupe of Koreans in Japan Leaves
articles.content:
Art Troupe of Koreans in Japan Leaves
 Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- An art troupe of Koreans in Japan led by Ri Yong Su Thursday left here after celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star).

articles.title: Voters' Meeting Pledges Loyalty to Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Voters' Meeting Pledges Loyalty to Kim Jong Un
 Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place by the voters of Paektusan Constituency No. 111 for the election of deputies to the 13th Supreme People's Assembly (SPA) of the DPRK at the April 25 House of Culture on Thursday to vow to repay with loyalty the big trust of Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA), who sent an open letter to all voters throughout the country.
					 Present there were Ri Yong Gil, Jang Jong Nam, officials of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces and service personnel of the KPA.
					
					 At the meeting Ri Yong Gil, chief of the KPA General Staff, read out the open letter sent by Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The participants broke into cheers as it was said in the open letter that Kim Jong Un decided to register as a candidate for deputy at Paektusan Constituency No. 111.
					
					 Resolution speeches were made.
					
					 Jang Jong Nam, minister of the People's Armed Forces, and other speakers said that it is the highest privilege and greatest honor for all the service personnel that Kim Jong Un registered as a candidate for deputy to the SPA at Paektusan Constituency No. 111.
					
					 They stressed that the People's Army should uphold with loyalty the cause of Mt. Paektu and the Party's revolutionary cause of Songun in the van and firmly guarantee a final victory of building a thriving socialist nation with matchless military strength.
					
					 They expressed their resolutions to cherish deep in their hearts the deep trust and expectation of Kim Jong Un and go to the polls and cast a ballot to glorify the state power of the Republic and demonstrate the invincibility of the powerful revolutionary Paektusan army and the might of the single-minded unity of the revolutionary ranks to the whole world.
					
					 At the end of the meeting all the participants held a dancing party with deep emotion and joy of celebration at the plaza of the April 25 House of Culture.

articles.title: Reception Marks Anniversary of Agreements between DPRK and China
articles.content:
Reception Marks Anniversary of Agreements between DPRK and China
 Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- A reception was given at Okryu Restaurant on Thursday by the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries and the General Bureau of Civil Aviation of the DPRK on the occasion of the 55th anniversary of conclusion of agreements on cultural cooperation and air transportation between the governments of the DPRK and China.
					 Present there on invitation were Liu Hongcai, Chinese ambassador to the DRPK, its embassy officials and Chinese guests staying here.
					
					 On hand were Kim Jong Suk, chairwoman of the committee, and officials concerned.

articles.title: Russian Ambassador, Military Attache Host Reception
articles.content:
Russian Ambassador, Military Attache Host Reception
 Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- Alexandr Timonin, Russian Ambassador to the DPRK, and Dmitri Zheleznikov, military attache of the embassy, hosted a reception at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Club on Thursday on the occasion of the Day of Defender of the Motherland.
					 Present there on invitation were Kang Phyo Yong, vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces, generals and other officers of the Korean People's Army, officials concerned, diplomatic envoys and military attaches of different countries here.
					
					 Members of the Russian embassy attended.

articles.title: Syrian Charge d' Affaires ad Interim Hosts Reception
articles.content:
Syrian Charge d' Affaires ad Interim Hosts Reception 
 Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- Tammam Sulaiman, Syrian Charge d' Affaires ad Interim to the DPRK, hosted a reception at the embassy on Thursday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Present there on invitation were Pak Ui Chun, minister of Foreign Affairs, Thae Hyong Chol, president of Kim Il Sung University who doubles as minister of Higher Education, and officials concerned.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 Tammam Sulaiman said that it is the greatest exploit of Kim Jong Il that he put the dignity of the country and nation on a highest ground by pursuing the Songun politics.
					
					 He referred to the fact that the army and people of the DPRK are working world-startling miracles in building a prosperous country true to the leadership of supreme leader Kim Jong Un who is carrying forward the noble intention of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He stressed that Syria will invariably support the Korean people's cause of justice on the international arena.
					
					 Pak Ui Chun emphasized that Kim Jong Il is the image of the motherland of Juche and great Paektusan nation and eternal sun of the era of independence unanimously admired by the progressive humankind.
					
					 He noted that the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries are growing stronger under the care of Kim Jong Un and Bashar Al－Assad, president of Syria.
					
					 He expressed the conviction that the DPRK will as ever extend full support and solidarity to the Syrian government and people in their struggle to defend the sovereignty of the country and achieve the territorial integrity.

articles.title: Kimjongilia Festival Draws Many Visitors
articles.content:
Kimjongilia Festival Draws Many Visitors
 Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- The 18th Kimjongilia Festival held here is drawing many visitors. 
					 According to Rim Yong Gum, an official of the Korea Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Committee, more than 270 000 people had visited the venue of the festival till February 18 with foreigners and overseas Koreans included.
					
					 All stands in the venue are bedecked with potted Kimjongilia flowers in full bloom, instilling visitors with profound reverence and ardent yearning for leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 What catch one's eye are the stands of the General Bureau of Public Service, the Ministry of Light Industry and the Kyonghung Guidance Bureau, with flowers on display before a large-sized electronic display screening the edifices built in Pyongyang, including the Rungna Dolphinarium.
					
					 Pae Kyong Sil, living in Taedonggang District, told KCNA that the exhibits have evoked the feelings of ardent yearning for Kim Jong Il, who worked heart and soul for the wellbeing of the people all his life.
					
					 The Ministry of Physical Culture and Sports, the Ministry of State Construction Control and the Academy of Agricultural Science have displayed the potted flowers with decorative letters "Let us demonstrate the invincibility and mightiness of Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's Korea to the whole world!".   Those flowers are witnessing the steadfast will of the Korean people to remain faithful to the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, who is carrying into practice Kim Jong Il's grandiose plan on building a thriving nation.

articles.title: 3rd Conference of Ideological Officials of Workers' Party of Korea
articles.content:
3rd Conference of Ideological Officials of Workers' Party of Korea
 Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- The 3rd Conference of Ideological Officials of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), held in February Juche 63 (1974), was a historic meeting in which the programme for modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism was proclaimed. 
					 At the conference, leader Kim Jong Il made public the famous work "On Some Immediate Tasks of Party Ideological Work for Modeling the Whole Society on Kimilsungism."
					
					 In the work, Kim Jong Il gave a scientific and theoretical clarification to the historical position and role of President Kim Il Sung's revolutionary idea, the Juche idea, proclaiming the start of the struggle for modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism.
					
					 The work comprehensively expounded the fundamental and immediate tasks for the party ideological work in pushing forward the struggle.
					
					 In the work, Kim Jong Il formulated the revolutionary idea of Kim Il Sung as an integral system of idea, theory and method of Juche.
					
					 Thanks to the publication of the work, the WPK and the Korean revolution could dynamically advance along the road indicated by the Juche idea, marking a great turning point with the start of the struggle for modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism.  
					
					 The party ideological work could be carried out in an original way as done by the anti-Japanese guerrillas with single-minded unity of service personnel and people consolidated as firm as an impregnable fortress. 
					
					 The might of the Korean-style socialism centered on the masses has been strengthened through the struggle for remolding man, society and nature as required by the Juche idea.
					
					 The reality in the DPRK clearly witnesses the validity and great vitality of Kim Jong Il's proclamation of the programme for modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism.

articles.title: Family of Doctorate Holders
articles.content:
Family of Doctorate Holders
 Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- In Jongju City, North Phyongan Province, the DPRK, there is a family with father and his three sons holding doctorate in poultry farming.
					 Father Hong Wan Thae, branch director of the Jongju Poultry Biomedicine Institute, has made great contributions to the research and production of vaccine for poultry diseases after graduating from a university. 
					
					 He wrote many books and brought up scores of holders of academic degrees. 
					
					 President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il met him and had photos taken with him. 
					
					 Academician, Prof. and Dr. Hong Wan Thae was honored to be awarded with Kim Il Sung Prize and the titles of Labor Hero and People's Scientist for his contribution to the development of the country's poultry farming.
					
					 His eldest son Hong Song Sik and second son Hong Yong Sik, graduates of Phyongsong University of Veterinary Science and Animal Husbandry,  are now working as a manager of a poultry farm and director of a poultry institute respectively, while his third son Hong Thae Sik are active as a section chief of a poultry institute.
					
					 All of them took part in the national meeting of scientists and technicians held last year and other national meetings.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Greeting Election of Deputies to SPA with High Political Enthusiasm and Labor Achievements
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Greeting Election of Deputies to SPA with High Political Enthusiasm and Labor Achievements
 Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- It is an honorable work for demonstrating the invincible spirit of the DPRK advancing with the might of the single-minded unity to greet the election of deputies to the 13th Supreme People's Assembly (SPA) with high political enthusiasm and shining labor achievements, says Rodong Sinmun Thursday in an editorial.
					 It goes on:
					
					 At the voters' meetings at all constituencies of the country for the nomination of candidate for deputy to the 13th SPA, all the voters nominated supreme leader Kim Jong Un as the candidate in reflection of their determination and will to entrust their destiny and future entirely to the Workers' Party of Korea and remain true to its leadership with loyalty.
					
					 The election is to be held at a time when the service personnel and people across the country are bringing about a new turning point of the Juche revolution, rallied close around Kim Jong Un under the banner of modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism. Therefore, the election serves as an important occasion in the development of the Korean revolution.
					
					 The election will demonstrate to the world the spirit of the unity of Songun Korea in which all the service personnel and people form a citadel and a shield and dynamically advance toward the bright future, rallied close around Kim Jong Un.
					
					 To greet the election with high political enthusiasm and labor achievements is a worthwhile work to give full play to the advantages of Korean-style socialism.
					
					 The editorial calls upon all the party members and other people to bring about innovations in production to greet the election with pride.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Reveals U.S. Intention in Getting Vocal about "Nuclear and Missile Threat" from DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Reveals U.S. Intention in Getting Vocal about "Nuclear and Missile Threat" from DPRK
 Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- Lockleaer, commander-in-chief of the U.S. Armed Forces in the Pacific, apparently referring to the DPRK, said that "threat" to south Korea and the world is intolerable and the U.S. is prepared to defend not only its own but its allies. He cried out for strengthening cooperation with Japan and even with south Korea in building a missile shield to cope with "threat" from the DPRK.
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 The "threat" from the DPRK touted by nuclear war maniacs, who turned south Korea into the biggest nuclear arsenal in the Far East, is sophism to cover up their sinister aim.
					
					 The U.S. seeks wicked aim in spreading the story of the non-existent "nuclear and missile threat". Its final aim is to contain the DPRK and countries around it with strength and, furthermore, realize its wild ambition to dominate the world.
					
					 One major aim sought by the U.S. in its defense strategy is to form an encirclement ring and prevent by armed forces big powers in Asia from growing up to be its rivals.
					
					 Lockleaer underlined the "importance" of strengthened cooperation with Japan and south Korea for security, only revealing his design to establish the U.S.-Japan-south Korea tripartite military alliance.
					
					 Whatever rhetoric the hostile forces may let loose, the DPRK will do what it has to do.
					
					 Invariable is its stand and principle to answer the U.S. dialogue with dialogue and hard-line step with the toughest measure, concludes the commentary.

articles.title: Cancellation of S. Korea-U.S. Joint Military Drills Urged by S. Korean Organization
articles.content:
Cancellation of S. Korea-U.S. Joint Military Drills Urged by S. Korean Organization
 Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- The South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration on Feb. 7 issued a statement in demand of the cancellation of the south Korea-U.S. joint military drills, according to Minjok Thongsin, an Internet paper of Koreans in the U.S.
					 The statement recalled that when the north and the south were reaching an agreement on the reunion of the separated families and their relatives, the U.S. nuclear-capable B-52s conducted bombing drills in the sky above Jik islet in the West Sea of Korea. It urged the "government" to clarify its intention.
					
					 This is a self-revelation of the true colors of the "government" and the U.S. which used to urge the north to show "sincerity", it said, adding such behavior of the "government" will only escalate conflict and tension.
					
					 The statement urged the present regime to make a resolute determination to cancel the projected joint military drills that screw up military tension in order to ensure peace on the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: Judgment of Guilty upon Lawmaker Denounced by S. Korean Religious Body
articles.content:
Judgment of Guilty upon Lawmaker Denounced by S. Korean Religious Body
 Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- The human rights centre of the Council of Christian Churches of south Korea in its commentary on Feb. 18 expressed concerns over the judgment of guilty delivered on Ri Sok Gi, a lawmaker from the opposition Unified Progressive Party.
					 Terming evidence raised by the prosecution at a recent trial related to the attempted rebellion case unreasonable one peppered with false data and groundless statements, etc., the commentary condemned the court for passing the judgment of guilty on Ri.
					
					 The court proceedings awoke us once again to the merciless abuse of human rights by the judicial verdicts based on political judgment, it noted.
					
					 It labeled the recent trial as an extension of the shameful history.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Marked by Koreans in Kyrgyzstan
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Marked by Koreans in Kyrgyzstan
 Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- The United Confederation of Koreans in Kyrgyzstan held celebration events at the Korean Center on Feb. 16, the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star).
					 Present there were Pak Kyong Ho, chairman of the confederation, officials and other Koreans.
					
					 The participants laid a floral basket and bouquets before the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and paid tribute.
					
					 At the meeting, Pak Kyong Ho said that on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star he looks back upon the brilliant revolutionary life of Kim Jong Il who performed immortal feats before the country and the nation.
					
					 Kim Jong Il is immortal in the hearts of the people for his outstanding idea, leadership ability and noble virtues, Pak said, adding:
					
					 The compatriots will make positive contribution to the struggle for providing a turning phase of the country's reunification this significant year in the idea of By Our Nation Itself to keep step with the people in the homeland in their dynamic drive.
					
					 The participants watched a DPRK film documenting the revolutionary activities of Kim Jong Il providing field guidance to the work of various fields of the national economy. 
					
					 They watched a performance given by Korean artistes for celebrating the Day of the Shining Star on the same day.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Marked Abroad
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Marked Abroad
 Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- Events took place in different countries on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star).
					 A seminar, book exhibition and film show were held in Nakhodka of Russia, a meeting and film show in Lahore of Pakistan and a meeting and photo exhibition in Reykjavik of Iceland on February 8 and 9.
					
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were photos documenting exploits of Kim Jong Il and supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Exhibited there were works of peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu and books and photos introducing the Korean people's efforts to build an economic power.
					
					 The participants watched the Korean films including "Frostwork and golden larch leaves on Mt. Paektu" in the film shows.
					
					 Zelenov, first secretary of the Nakhodka City Committee of the Maritime Territory of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, praised Kim Jong Il for turning the DPRK into an invincible socialist power through his outstanding Songun leadership.
					
					 Reporter and speakers including Mohammad Aslam Nagi, secretary general of the Lahore Branch of the Pakistan-Korea Friendship Association praised him for developing the Workers' Party of Korea into the party of President Kim Il Sung, building the DPRK as a political and ideological and military power and fully demonstrating the independent dignity of the country.
					
					 Jon Arni Halldorsson, general secretary of the Iceland-DPRK Friendship and Cultural Society, said that Kim Jong Il is alive in the hearts of the progressive mankind as he performed great exploits before the era and the history.
					
					 A message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting held in Pakistan.

articles.title: Exploits of Peerlessly Great Men Praised in Different Countries
articles.content:
Exploits of Peerlessly Great Men Praised in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- Seminars took place in Kyrgyzstan, Finland and Colombia from Feb. 8 to 10 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il and the 40th anniversary of his proclamation of the programme for modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism.
					 A. Usupbayev, chairman of the Central Council of the People Unity-"Kyrgys El" Republican Political Party who doubles as chief of the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il in his work "On Some Immediate Tasks for Party Ideological Work for Modeling the Whole Society on Kimilsungism" noted that to model the whole society on Kimilsungism is the main task of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) in its ideological work, setting forth such militant slogan as "Let Us Model the Whole Society on Kimilsungism!"
					
					 After the publication of the work the WPK further developed into the party of President Kim Il Sung, a mother party looking after the destiny and future of people with responsibility.
					
					 Now the WPK is making a vigorous drive to achieve a final victory holding high the banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism under the wise guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Juha Kieksy, chairman of the Finnish National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, said that Kim Jong Il performed great ideological and theoretical exploits for the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence. The revolutionary idea of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il is illuminating the whole world, he stressed.
					
					 Jairo Gonzalez Trujillo, president of the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea "Kanggye" of Colombia, and other speakers praised the undying feats performed by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for the human cause of independence and the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un who is leading the struggle of service personnel and people of the DPRK to achieve a final victory.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded by Syrian Figure
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded by Syrian Figure
 Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- Saber Ballul, head of a department of the Political Faculty of the University of Damascus, issued a statement on February 13 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 He said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il was a prominent thinker and theoretician who glorified the Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung as a great guiding idea in the era of independence.
					
					 He was an invincible and iron-willed commander who turned the DPRK into an invincible socialist power which no one dares provoke and developed the Korean People's Army into a matchless powerful army, firmly defending the dignity of the country and its sovereignty by pursuing the Songun politics.
					
					 He was a benevolent father of the people, who closely rallied the whole people by pursuing the politics of love and trust and devoted his all to the happiness of the people.
					
					 He was a defender of socialism who demonstrated the scientific accuracy and truth of socialism and the inevitability of its victory by conducting energetic ideological and theoretical activities and smashed the imperialists' moves against socialism.
					
					 Immortal exploits he performed for the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence will be cherished in the hearts of the followers of the Juche idea and the progressive mankind for all ages.
					
					 The Korean people will surely emerge victorious in the struggle for defending the sovereignty of the country and building a thriving nation under the wise leadership of supreme leader Kim Jong Un who is successfully carrying forward the idea and cause of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised Abroad
 Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- Meetings and book and photo exhibitions took place in Austria, Norway and Sweden on February 13 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star).
					 Displayed at the venues of events were photos documenting exploits of President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Exhibited there were works of peerlessly great men and books and photos introducing the Korean people's drive to build a thriving nation.
					
					 Erich Zavadil, chairman of the Consultative Committee of the Society for the Promotion of the Relations between Austria and DPRK said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il devoted all his life to the country and its people.
					
					 He conducted energetic activities for independent and peaceful reunification of the country.
					
					 His exploits are being successfully carried forward by Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Dag Norum, co-chairman of the Norwegian preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Shining Star, said that Kim Jong Il was the greatest man, peerless patriot, outstanding thinker and theoretician and great master of leadership.
					
					 Christer Lundgren, chairman of the Sweden－Korea Friendship Association, said:
					
					 Kim Jong Un is carrying forward the revolutionary idea and line of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He works hard to let the Korean people live in full luxury and comfort under socialism.
					
					 We are convinced that the Korean people will continuously make great successes in building a thriving socialist nation, rallied close around Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Internet Homepage by Peruvian Body
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Internet Homepage by Peruvian Body
 Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Brilliantly Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche, Holding Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as the Eternal General Secretary of Our Party" was posted on Internet Homepage by the Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism on Feb. 14.
					 The work, published on April 6, Juche 101 (2012), says that holding leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea is a principled requirement for victoriously advancing the cause of Korean revolution and indicates the tasks to steadily strengthen and develop the party into the glorious Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's party.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Germany
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Germany
 Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Revolutionary Comradeship Is the Foundation of the Single-minded Unity and an Engine of Our Revolution" was brought out in booklet by the Achawi Media Print Publishing House in Berlin, Germany with due ceremony on Feb. 13.
					 The work, published on April 7, Juche 93 (2004), clarifies the essence of revolutionary comradeship and the reason why the comradeship is the foundation of the single-minded unity and an engine of revolution, indicating the tasks to turn the whole society into the one based on the comradeship under the slogan of comradeship.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Marked by Koreans in Uzbekistan
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Marked by Koreans in Uzbekistan
 Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- An event took place at the DPRK embassy in Uzbekistan to lay a floral basket and bouquets before the full-length painting of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il standing together on February 16, the birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star).
					 Present there were Ju Yong Il, chairman of the Uzbekistan "Old Persons" Association for Korean Cultural Tradition, officials, heads of art troupes of compatriots and other Koreans.
					
					 The participants laid a floral basket and bouquets before the painting and paid tribute.
					
					 And they went round the venue of a photo exhibition on the theme of "Comrade Kim Jong Il, great leader of the Korean people".

articles.title: Kim Jong Un vuelve a recorrer Fabrica 2 de Noviembre de EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un vuelve a recorrer Fabrica 2 de Noviembre de EPC
Pyongyang, 20 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, volvio a dirigir en el terreno la Fabrica 2 de Noviembre del EPC.
					El Mariscal paso revista a varios puntos de la fabrica incluyendo la sala de presentacion del historial, la de control general y las brigadas de caramelos, galletas, soyas tostadas con revestimiento de azucar, y turrones de soya analizando en detalles el estado de modernizacion del proceso productivo.
					
					Dijo que recibio informaciones de que los trabajadores de la fabrica cumplieron con exito las detalladas tareas que les habia dado al recorrerla el ano pasado y visito otra vez, muy contento de que resulto posible realizar otro legado de los Generalisimos.
					
					En la sala de control general senalo que este lugar, que antes desempenaba la funcion de vigilancia sobre el terreno, se transformo en la sala de control de alta inteligencia, equipada con el perfecto sistema de vigilancia, control y mando sobre el proceso integral de produccion.
					
					Se puso alegre de que se automatizaron todos los procesos desde el metimiento de materiales hasta produccion y embalaje, lo que posibilito ahorrar mucha mano de obra y aumentar considerablemente la productividad.
					
					Dijo que la fabrica esteril y libre de polvo  garantiza estrictamente la seguridad higienica que surge como un problema importante en las fabricas de alimentos y agrego que los obreros trabajan alegres en un ambiente sin contaminacion por el ruido y dotado del seguro sistema de ventilacion.
					
					La modernizacion del proceso productivo se cumplio efectivamente en lo general, lo cual es la modernizacion a nuestro estilo deseada por el Partido, aprecio.
					
					Destaco que el mismo se encargaria del aseguramiento de condiciones y encomendo a los funcionarios a normalizar la produccion y enviar mucho mas a los militares los alimentos de variados tipos.
					
					Evaluo que los funcionarios, obreros, cientificos y tecnicos de la rama correspondiente ayudaron sinceramente al Comandante Supremo mediante la realizacion de modernizacion del proceso productivo y les dio el agradecimiento del Comandante Supremo del EPC.
					
					Este dia, el Mariscal tomo fotos de recuerdo junto con los obreros de la fabrica.
					
					Le acompanaron el coronel general de las fuerzas terrestres del EPC So Hong Chan, primer viceministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares y Hwang Pyong So, subjefe de departamento del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.

articles.title: Comite Electoral Central publica informacion
articles.content:
Comite Electoral Central publica informacion
Pyongyang, 20 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Comite Electoral Central para elegir a los diputados a la XIII Legislatura de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo publica el dia 19 una informacion que sigue:
					En los colegios y reuniones de todos los distritos electorales del pais para elegir a los diputados a la XIII Legislatura de la APS de la RPDC, el Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, fue electo como candidato a diputado.
					
					La eleccion es una manifestacion del apoyo absoluto y confianza a el de todos los oficiales y soldados del ejercito y el pueblo coreano y de la conviccion revolucionaria y voluntad indoblegable de ellos de llevar a feliz termino la causa revolucionaria del Juche, la del Songun, iniciada en el monte Paektu siguiendo la direccion del Mariscal.
					
					En su mensaje abierto enviado a todos los electores del pais, Kim Jong Un les expreso agradecimiento y anuncio su decision de inscribirse en la circunscripcion 111 de Paektusan, segun la ley electoral de los diputados a las asambleas populares de todos los niveles de la RPDC, la cual exige que el candidato se registre en una sola circunscripcion.
					
					Informados del mensaje abierto, todos los electores del pais dirigen al Mariscal la maxima gloria y el mas profundo agradecimiento y redoblan la determinacion de enaltecerle como el unico centro de unidad y direccion y de abrir la era de prosperidad de la Corea del Songun con la conviccion de la victoria y el entusiasmo.
					
					El comite electoral de la circunscripcion 111 de Paektusan registro como candidato a diputado a la decimotercera Legislatura de la APS a Kim Jong Un quien presento el ejercito popular como fidedigna patrulla y punto de sosten de la revolucion del Songun y lo convirtio en el poderoso ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu sin rival y defendio asi con firmeza el destino de la patria socialista y del pueblo.
					
					El Comite Electoral Central informa que Kim Jong Un fue inscrito como candidato a diputado a la APS en la circunscripcion 111 de Paektusan.

articles.title: Tiene lugar mitin de juramento de electores de circunscripcion 111 de Paektusan
articles.content:
Tiene lugar mitin de juramento de electores de circunscripcion 111 de Paektusan
Pyongyang, 20 de febrero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 20 en la capitalina Casa Cultural 25 de Abril el mitin de juramento de los electores de la circunscripcion 111 de Paektusan para las elecciones de diputados a la XIII Legislatura de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea para responder con fidelidad a la gran confianza del Mariscal Kim Jong Un quien envio mensaje abierto a todos los electores del pais. 
					Asistieron a la ocasion Ri Yong Gil, Jang Jong Nam y otros funcionarios del Ministerio de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea. 
					
					El jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC, Ri Yong Gil, dio lectura al mensaje abierto del Mariscal. 
					
					Al escuchar que el Comandante Supremo decidio inscribirse como candidato al diputado a la APS en la circunscripcion 111 de Paektusan, todos los participantes comenzaron a aclamar. 
					
					Luego, hubo discursos de juramento. 
					
					El ministro de las FAP, Jang Jong Nam, y otros oradores dijeron que la inscripcion del Mariscal es el maximo privilegio y maxima gloria para todos los oficiales y soldados del EPC. 
					
					Enfatizaron que el EPC debe apoyar fielmente al frente la causa del Paektu, la revolucionaria del Songun del partido, y garantizar con armas la victoria final de la construccion de un Estado prospero socialista. 
					
					Manifestaron la decision de ejercer el voto de fidelidad y de unidad monolitica teniendo presente la gran confianza y esperanza del Comandante Supremo para glorificar el Poder de la Republica y demostrar a todo el mundo el poderio invencible del ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu y la unidad monolitica de las filas revolucionarias. 
					
					Terminado el mitin, los participantes realizaron un baile en la explanada frente a la Casa Cultural 25 de Abril para expresar su gran emocion y alegria.
